Package bwapiMath.graph

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IConnector<T>
    IConnector.java --- Interface defining the function for adding edges to a DirectedGraph instance.
    IInstanceMapper<T>
    IInstanceMapper.java --- Interface defining a mapping function for generating a HashMap containing instances mapped to unique indices.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BreadthAccessGenerator
    BreadthAccessGenerator.java --- Class containing functions for performing (reversed) breadth searches with IInstanceMapper and IConnector instances.
    BreadthFirstSearch
    BreadthFirstSearch.java --- Simple Class used for performing a BreadthFirstSearch on a given DirectedGraphList.
    DirectedGraphList
    DirectedGraphList.java --- Graph Class used for representing a simple directed graph.
    RegionConnector
    RegionConnector.java --- Class implementing the IConnector-Interface connecting BWTA.Regions in the graph based on their accessibility to one another.
    RegionInstanceMapper
    RegionInstanceMapper.java --- Class implementing the IIstanceMapper-Interface for mapping BWTA.Region instances to unique indices.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BreadthFirstSearch.c
